content.p: Transparency International Malaysia (TI-M) Internship Programme Description: Transparency International Malaysia (TI-M) is an independent, non-governmental and non-partisan organisation committed to the fight against corruption. Founded in 1998, TI-M is registered with the Registrar of Societies Malaysia as the Malaysian Society for Transparency and Integrity (ROS: 1649) and is the accredited National Chapter of the Berlin-based Transparency International. TI-M is looking for is looking for individuals who are passionate about promoting transparency, accountability and integrity throughout society. We're looking for Communications Intern to join us for 6-months full-time with payment of RM50 per day at our office in PJ as soon as possible. Position Summary: To assist with the development and implementation of TI-M’s communications and advocacy strategy, which is aligned with the organisation’s strategy. Responsibilities: Requirements: How to apply If you’re keen to join us as an intern, write to Ms Jessica Sercombe at ti-malaysia@transparency.org.my with the subject heading “INTERNSHIP”, introducing yourself by providing us your personal details (name, contact information and general background) or call 03-7960 6630. Contact: Transparency International Malaysia 23 Jalan Pantai 9/7 46000 Petaling Jaya Selangor Darul Ehsan GPS: 3.102286, 101.65125 Phone: +6(03)- 7960 6630 Fax: +6(03)- 7960 8690 telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
